name: HeroSplitDualMedia
description: Split-layout hero section with configurable background, text content with rating on one side, and dual image/video grid on the other.

title.example: Transform your business with proven strategies

description.example: I help entrepreneurs and executives unlock their full potential and build thriving businesses.

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

mediaItems.note: Array of exactly 2 media items displayed in 2-column grid

structure.imageSrc: string - Path to image (optional if videoSrc provided)
structure.videoSrc: string - Path to video (optional if imageSrc provided)

rating.note: Number of filled star icons to display

ratingText.note: Text displayed next to star rating

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <HeroSplitDualMedia
    title="Transform your business with proven strategies"
    description="I help entrepreneurs unlock their full potential."
    background={{ variant: 'plain' }}
    tag="Business Coach"
    tagIcon={Briefcase}
    buttons={[{ text: 'Book a Call', href: '#' }]}
    mediaItems={[
      { imageSrc: '/coach1.jpg', imageAlt: 'Coaching session' },
      { imageSrc: '/coach2.jpg', imageAlt: 'Workshop' }
    ]}
    rating={5}
    ratingText="Rated by loving Clients"
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for coaching, consulting, or service-focused landing pages
Include star rating for social proof
Full viewport height with split layout
dont: Do not use without 2 media items
Do not use for product showcases
